Description: Magical gem in form of a stamp seal; haematite; perforated and threaded with gold(?) suspension-ring. A: Scarab from above, surrounded with five eight-pointed stars. The beetle has four pairs of legs, its antennae are crescent-shaped, resembling a crab. B: High, conical reverse, drilled through, with a modern wire. Plain.
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (578)
CBd / The Campbell Bonner Magical Gems Database Online (937) (http://classics.mfab.hu/talismans/cbd/937)
